ai-mil7.2.5:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the two factors should be cared by one who belongs to?”
ai-mil7.2.5:1.2_0: “Great king, in the wilderness, in a forest wilderness, in the forest, thicket the mountains, like the mountains, or the forest beasts; and birds take a rock.
ai-mil7.2.5:1.3_0: In the same way, one who frequents a wilderness, the root of a tree, a hill, a ravine, a mountain cave, a charnel ground, a forest, the open air, a heap of straw.
ai-mil7.2.5:1.4_0: For a mendicant who conducts seclusion in seclusion, not long in one who lives, having attained the six classes of rebirth-linking.
ai-mil7.2.5:1.5_0: This is the first place, Great King, in the allocations.
ai-mil7.2.5:2.1_0: ʻNo matter how the Buddha explains the name
ai-mil7.2.5:2.2_0: After caught up in the home, and grabbing a deer—
ai-mil7.2.5:2.3_0: Then at that same time the Buddha
ai-mil7.2.5:3.1_0: Furthermore, an lamp, when they see any kind of gruel they don’t see anyone.
ai-mil7.2.5:3.2_0: In the same way, great king, one who frequents a gift by gift of bamboos, or by gifts of flowers, fruits, bathing powder, and tooth sticks, or by flattery, or by bean-soupery, or by fondling, or by going on errands on foot, or by spending the food and drink, clothes, vehicles, by the Buddhas, authorns, or by gifts, and by gifts of giving and servants as a deportment, or by gifts, or by going on foot, or by an erection, or by arand, or by sympathy, or by the Buddha.
ai-mil7.2.5:3.3_0: this is the second lamp of the Island.
ai-mil7.2.5:3.4_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.2.5:5.4_0: would you like someone who kills life?’”
ai-mil7.2.5:6.1_0: The fifth enlightenment is the fifth enlightenment.
